ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: RESTRICTED TO 501 (C) (3) ORGANIZATIONS IN MONTGOMERY COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA MUST AID HANDICAPPED CHILDREN UNDER AGE 21 IN MONTGOMERY COUNTY, PENNA.
